isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - MODULAR CONTROL VALVE (MV-3) - CLEAN AND INSPECT

svcproc.title: CLEAN AND INSPECT
svcproc.para: The non-metallic components which comprise most of the parts of the valve should not be immersed in any solvent type cleaner. Old lubricant should be wiped off parts prior to reassembly and the bores of the body wiped out with a clean, dry cloth.
